24  package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.regions;
25  
26  import java.util.Properties;
27  
28  import net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache;
29  import net.sf.ehcache.Element;
30  import net.sf.ehcache.concurrent.CacheLockProvider;
31  import net.sf.ehcache.concurrent.LockType;
32  import net.sf.ehcache.concurrent.StripedReadWriteLockSync;
33  import net.sf.ehcache.constructs.nonstop.NonStopCacheException;
34  
35  import org.hibernate.cache.CacheException;
36  import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.nonstop.HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler;
37  import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.strategy.EhcacheAccessStrategyFactory;
38  import org.hibernate.cache.spi.CacheDataDescription;
39  import org.hibernate.cache.spi.TransactionalDataRegion;
40  import org.hibernate.cfg.Settings;
41  
42  /**
43   * An Ehcache specific TransactionalDataRegion.
44   * <p/>
45   * This is the common superclass entity and collection regions.
46   *
47   * @author Chris Dennis
48   * @author Greg Luck
49   * @author Emmanuel Bernard
50   * @author Abhishek Sanoujam
51   * @author Alex Snaps
52   */
53  public class EhcacheTransactionalDataRegion extends EhcacheDataRegion implements TransactionalDataRegion {
54  
55  	private static final int LOCAL_LOCK_PROVIDER_CONCURRENCY = 128;
56  
57  	/**
58  	 * Hibernate settings associated with the persistence unit.
59  	 */
60  	protected final Settings settings;
61  
62  	/**
63  	 * Metadata associated with the objects stored in the region.
64  	 */
65  	protected final CacheDataDescription metadata;
66  
67  	private final CacheLockProvider lockProvider;
68  
69  	/**
70  	 * Construct an transactional Hibernate cache region around the given Ehcache instance.
71  	 */
72  	EhcacheTransactionalDataRegion(EhcacheAccessStrategyFactory accessStrategyFactory, Ehcache cache, Settings settings,
73  								   CacheDataDescription metadata, Properties properties) {
74  		super( accessStrategyFactory, cache, properties );
75  		this.settings = settings;
76  		this.metadata = metadata;
77  
78  		Object context = cache.getInternalContext();
79  		if ( context instanceof CacheLockProvider ) {
80  			this.lockProvider = (CacheLockProvider) context;
81  		}
82  		else {
83  			this.lockProvider = new StripedReadWriteLockSync( LOCAL_LOCK_PROVIDER_CONCURRENCY );
84  		}
85  	}
86  
87  	/**
88  	 * Return the hibernate settings
89  	 *
90  	 * @return settings
91  	 */
92  	public Settings getSettings() {
93  		return settings;
94  	}
95  
96  	/**
97  	 * {@inheritDoc}
98  	 */
99  	public boolean isTransactionAware() {
100 		return false;
101 	}
102 
103 	/**
104 	 * {@inheritDoc}
105 	 */
106 	public CacheDataDescription getCacheDataDescription() {
107 		return metadata;
108 	}
109 
110 	/**
111 	 * Get the value mapped to this key, or null if no value is mapped to this key.
112 	 */
113 	public final Object get(Object key) {
114 		try {
115 			Element element = cache.get( key );
116 			if ( element == null ) {
117 				return null;
118 			}
119 			else {
120 				return element.getObjectValue();
121 			}
122 		}
123 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
124 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
125 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
126 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
127 				return null;
128 			}
129 			else {
130 				throw new CacheException( e );
131 			}
132 		}
133 	}
134 
135 	/**
136 	 * Map the given value to the given key, replacing any existing mapping for this key
137 	 */
138 	public final void put(Object key, Object value) throws CacheException {
139 		try {
140 			Element element = new Element( key, value );
141 			cache.put( element );
142 		}
143 		catch ( IllegalArgumentException e ) {
144 			throw new CacheException( e );
145 		}
146 		catch ( IllegalStateException e ) {
147 			throw new CacheException( e );
148 		}
149 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
150 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
151 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
152 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
153 			}
154 			else {
155 				throw new CacheException( e );
156 			}
157 		}
158 	}
159 
160 	/**
161 	 * Remove the mapping for this key (if any exists).
162 	 */
163 	public final void remove(Object key) throws CacheException {
164 		try {
165 			cache.remove( key );
166 		}
167 		catch ( ClassCastException e ) {
168 			throw new CacheException( e );
169 		}
170 		catch ( IllegalStateException e ) {
171 			throw new CacheException( e );
172 		}
173 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
174 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
175 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
176 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
177 			}
178 			else {
179 				throw new CacheException( e );
180 			}
181 		}
182 	}
183 
184 	/**
185 	 * Remove all mapping from this cache region.
186 	 */
187 	public final void clear() throws CacheException {
188 		try {
189 			cache.removeAll();
190 		}
191 		catch ( IllegalStateException e ) {
192 			throw new CacheException( e );
193 		}
194 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
195 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
196 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
197 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
198 			}
199 			else {
200 				throw new CacheException( e );
201 			}
202 		}
203 	}
204 
205 	/**
206 	 * Attempts to write lock the mapping for the given key.
207 	 */
208 	public final void writeLock(Object key) {
209 		try {
210 			lockProvider.getSyncForKey( key ).lock( LockType.WRITE );
211 		}
212 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
213 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
214 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
215 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
216 			}
217 			else {
218 				throw new CacheException( e );
219 			}
220 		}
221 	}
222 
223 	/**
224 	 * Attempts to write unlock the mapping for the given key.
225 	 */
226 	public final void writeUnlock(Object key) {
227 		try {
228 			lockProvider.getSyncForKey( key ).unlock( LockType.WRITE );
229 		}
230 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
231 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
232 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
233 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
234 			}
235 			else {
236 				throw new CacheException( e );
237 			}
238 		}
239 	}
240 
241 	/**
242 	 * Attempts to read lock the mapping for the given key.
243 	 */
244 	public final void readLock(Object key) {
245 		try {
246 			lockProvider.getSyncForKey( key ).lock( LockType.WRITE );
247 		}
248 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
249 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
250 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
251 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
252 			}
253 			else {
254 				throw new CacheException( e );
255 			}
256 		}
257 	}
258 
259 	/**
260 	 * Attempts to read unlock the mapping for the given key.
261 	 */
262 	public final void readUnlock(Object key) {
263 		try {
264 			lockProvider.getSyncForKey( key ).unlock( LockType.WRITE );
265 		}
266 		catch ( net.sf.ehcache.CacheException e ) {
267 			if ( e instanceof NonStopCacheException ) {
268 				HibernateNonstopCacheExceptionHandler.getInstance()
269 						.handleNonstopCacheException( (NonStopCacheException) e );
270 			}
271 			else {
272 				throw new CacheException( e );
273 			}
274 		}
275 	}
276 
277 	/**
278 	 * Returns <code>true</code> if the locks used by the locking methods of this region are the independent of the cache.
279 	 * <p/>
280 	 * Independent locks are not locked by the cache when the cache is accessed directly.  This means that for an independent lock
281 	 * lock holds taken through a region method will not block direct access to the cache via other means.
282 	 */
283 	public final boolean locksAreIndependentOfCache() {
284 		return lockProvider instanceof StripedReadWriteLockSync;
285 	}
286 }
